casebody.data:
No. 9,

Original.

Texas v. New Mexico et al. Solicitor General Sobeloff, Assistant Attorney General Rankin, Oscar H. Davis and George S. Swarth for the United States.

The request of the United States that it be permitted to defer until November 15, 1956, the submission of a statement of its views regarding its indispensability as a party to this suit is granted.
